verses.name: Ezra 8:5
verses.text: Of the sons of Shechaniah; the son of Jahaziel, and with him three hundred males.

verses.name: Ezra 8:6
verses.text: Of the sons also of Adin; Ebed the son of Jonathan, and with him fifty males.

verses.name: Ezra 8:7
verses.text: And of the sons of Elam; Jeshaiah the son of Athaliah, and with him seventy males.

verses.name: Ezra 8:8
verses.text: And of the sons of Shephatiah; Zebadiah the son of Michael, and with him fourscore males.

verses.name: Ezra 8:9
verses.text: Of the sons of Joab; Obadiah the son of Jehiel, and with him two hundred and eighteen males.

verses.name: Ezra 8:10
verses.text: And of the sons of Shelomith; the son of Josiphiah, and with him an hundred and threescore males.
